title: Judaism, Christianity, and Islam common belief

content.question: Judaism, Christianity, and Islam share which of the following?

choices.label: They recognize the divine nature of certain prophets.
They revere both Mecca and Jerusalem as pilgrimage sites.
They recognize the existence of Adam and of Moses.
They share the Talmud and the Gospels as sacred texts.

content.answer: They recognize the existence of Adam and of Moses.
